event.reason: Alert created for firefox-bin from Platform Rule: Process Tracing in Container in Group Docker in Site Serveurs Linux of Account example.com, detected on host01.example.com.

user.domain: Effective: testuser, Real: testuser, Login: testuser

rule.description: Detects the use of ptrace to attach to another process within a container. This behavior may indicate process tracing for debugging or, in a malicious context, reconnaissance or preparation for process injection. While ptrace is legitimate in some development scenarios, its use within production containers is uncommon and may suggest potential privilege escalation or lateral movement attempts.
rule.name: Process Tracing in Container

data.fullScopeDetails: Group Docker in Site Serveurs Linux of Account example.com
data.indicatordescription: A process started tracing another running process
